title: Edward Benguiat
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20141031100907/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20141031100907/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Edward Benguiat**

Edward Benguiat, early employee of [ITC](http://web.archive.org/web/20141031100907/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ITC), designer of many popular typefaces including the eponymous ITC Benguiat and ITC Benguiat Gothic, and Benguiat Interlock, recently revived in full OpenType glory by [House Industries](http://web.archive.org/web/20141031100907/http:/typophile.com/wiki/House%20Industries). He also worked on many revivals for ITC, including ITC [Souvenir](http://web.archive.org/web/20141031100907/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Souvenir), ITC Bookman, and ITC Cheltenham.

[MacWorld profile](http://web.archive.org/web/20141031100907/http:/www.macworld.com/2001/04/bc/25benguiat/), 2001.

[Linotype biography](http://web.archive.org/web/20141031100907/http:/www.linotype.com/7-1515-7/edwardbenguiat.html)
